product_name: Exped Sleeping Pad Coupler Kit - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This coupler kit keeps 2Exped sleeping mats (sold separately) side by side for a comfortable night's sleep without any shifting or creeping of the sleeping mats from underneath you.
short_description: This coupler kit keeps 2Exped sleeping mats (sold separately) side by side for a comfortable night's sleep without any shifting or creeping of the sleeping mats from underneath you.
